test.create_query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS test_adaptive_reorder_function_arguments (s UInt32, i UInt32) ENGINE=Memory;
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO test_adaptive_reorder_function_arguments SELECT number % 10 as s , rand() % 20000 as i FROM numbers(100000000)
test.query: SELECT * FROM test_adaptive_reorder_function_arguments WHERE s = 1 and i = 1 Format Null settings short_circuit_function_evaluation='force_enable'
SELECT * FROM test_adaptive_reorder_function_arguments WHERE i = 1 and s = 1 Format Null settings short_circuit_function_evaluation='force_enable'
SELECT * FROM test_adaptive_reorder_function_arguments WHERE s = 1 or i = 1 Format Null settings short_circuit_function_evaluation='force_enable'
SELECT * FROM test_adaptive_reorder_function_arguments WHERE i = 1 or s = 1 Format Null settings short_circuit_function_evaluation='force_enable'
